name: v0.8.8-beta.0
body:
This release fixes an issue with TTS and other locales.  It also updates the way we are setting and applying the screen dimming feature.  Users can now set the percentage to dim the screen during night mode. 


Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.7-beta.5
body:
* fix for custom topics

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.7-beta.4
body:
* improved MQTT reconnect on WiFi disconnect
* handling error messages on MQTT disconnect or error only on init
* we lost our Crashlytics reporting, adding back older method for Crashlytics

Note that this version supports a minimum Android API of 19, previously it was API 16 but due to changes in the MQTT library, the minimum supported API version for Android is now 19. If you need support on older devices running below Android 19, please use any APK version prior to this release.

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.7-beta.3
body:
* Added support for 64-bit devices for new Google requirements.
* Added toggle for hardware acceleration for rendering camera and web.
* Added hardware rendering for web pages on older devices.

Note that this version supports a minimum Android API of 19, previously it was API 16 but due to changes in the MQTT library, the minimum supported API version for Android is now 19. If you need support on older devices running below Android 19, please use any APK version prior to this release.

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.7-beta.2
body:
* Fix for camera not generating images for MJPEG streaming
* Added toggle for hardware acceleration to the display preferences

Note that this version supports a minimum Android API of 19, previously it was API 16 but due to changes in the MQTT library, the minimum supported API version for Android is now 19. If you need support on older devices running below Android 19, please use any APK version prior to this release.

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.7-beta.1
body:
* Upgraded to AndroidX and 64 bit compatibility
* Upgraded Paho MQTT library
* Support for minimum Android 4.4 (API level 19)
* Fixed camera crash on Android 5.1.1 devices 

Note that this version supports a minimum Android API of 19, previously it was API 16 but due to changes in the MQTT library, the minimum supported API version for Android is now 19. If you need support on older devices running below Android 19, please use any APK version prior to this release.

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.6-beta.5
body:
Added additional performance and crash reporting tools. Minor tweaks and enhancements.

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.6-beta.4
body:
This release resets device brightness control to automatic when brightness setting deactivated or permissions have been removed.  This release also contains other bug fixes and improvements.

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.6.0-beta.3
body:
* Fixed bug with MQTT library that was disconnecting clients

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.6.0-beta.1
body:
* This version has breaking changes for night mode and weather
* The night mode and weather now receive data through MQTT
* The weather platform in HA is now used for creating MQTT weather
* The sun platform in HA is used for day and night mode MQTT data
* Added a new webpage screensaver function which can use a basis webpage or animation 
* Retain MQTT messages are no optional and can be changed in the MQTT settings

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.5.beta.7
body:
* Fix for clock screensaver sometimes appearing offscreen
* Fixed missing fonts in UI for some dialogs
* Added feature to adjust screen brightness when application uses night mode
* Changed font color of screensaver text to be more tranquil

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.5.beta.6
body:
* Set camera stream size to match supported camera resolution
* Removed maximum number for port numbers
* French translation update
* Added Swedish translations

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

body:

* Updated method for displaying 12/24 hour clock
* Ensure url is not null when doing page load on WebView
* Remove restart MQTT service as its not needed.

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.5.beta.1
body:

* Fix for multiple alert dialogs created on MQTT error
* Fix for null pointer in Platform view

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file. You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.4.beta.0
body:
* Added camera rotate feature
* Added feature to disable refresh on platform view
* Fixed text displayed during night mode for code dialog
* Fixed issue that would not display camera unless motion or face detection active

Install the APK by downloading and clicking in the file.  You will need permissions to install from unknown sources to install the application.  You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.3.beta.8
body:
* Added layouts for 720dpi devices
* Reduced layout size for 640dpi devices
* Added error for missing vision library API on device

Install the APK by side-loading onto your device using the Android adb command line tool. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.3.beta.4
body:
* Fix for MJPEG streaming not working unless motion detection active
* Fix for text not showing in night mode for fingerprint scanner
* Adjusted disable dialog UI for larger screens

Install the APK by side-loading onto your device using the Android adb command line tool. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.3.beta.2
body:
* Fix for crash on Android 9 devices and starting services
* Fix for crash when no WebView component present on device
* Fix for crash on some older Android devices with waking the device

Install the APK by side-loading onto your device using the Android adb command line tool. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.8.2.beta.9
body:
* Fix for MJPEG stream number not updating in settings
* Fix for crash on platform screen for some devices
* Stream video, detect motion, detect faces, and read QR Codes
* Remotely control the application over MQTT (speak text, play audio, display notifications and alerts)
* Device sensor data reporting over MQTT (temperature, light, pressure, battery, etc.)

Install the APK by side-loading onto your device using the Android adb command line tool. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.7.7-beta.2
body:
* Application can be landscape or portrait
* Fix for text on options dialog for certain languages
* MQTT messages are not retained by default
* Screen saver now displays weather
* Fix for fingerprint authentication always active
* Fixed database crash for weather data 

Install the APK by side-loading onto your device using the Android adb command line tool. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.7.6-beta
body:
* Updated fingerprint code to better support Samsung devices
* Simplified the alert sound when prompted to disarm alarm on entry

Install the APK by side-loading onto your device using the Android adb command line tool. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.

name: v0.7.5-beta
body:
* Removed button sounds, no relying on users own system button sounds
* Now using device alarm sound when prompted to enter code to disarm
* Fixed crash on some devices when viewing the platform settings screen
* Fixed issue with Samsung devices not recognizing finger unlock support

Install the APK by side-loading onto your device using the Android adb command line tool. You can also download the latest version from the Google Play store https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.thanksmister.iot.mqtt.alarmpanel.
